group_1.narration: We searched for signs of Mihono everywhere we could...

group_1.textLeft: ...Thanks for taking the time to keep us updated,@Tamaki.
Yeah...@No sightings, either.
Do you think she's still in Kosho Ward after all?
Oh, Nanase and friends!
Have you been searching around here for us?

group_1.textRight: We filmed quite a few scenes here, after all...!

group_1.textLeft: Aha... Focusing your search on the filming locations.@Good idea!

group_1.textRight: I suppose Mizuna Shrine and Mizuna Girls' School@are up next?
Ami-senpai is taking care of Mizuna Shrine right now.

group_1.textLeft: How about we head to the school, then?@Thank you, Nanase!
...Not here either, huh?
And since Ami came up empty-handed too...

group_1.textRight: All that's left is the museum...@That is to say, Tsukihiko's mansion.

group_1.textLeft: ...That definitely sounds like our lead candidate.

group_1.textRight: The place where the two of them met, and the place@where they died side by side.

group_1.narration: I'd been considering it as the most likely possibility.
"Ruri" appears at "Tsukihiko's" mansion,@fatally stabs "Tsukihiko,"@and ends her own life...
That was their fate as dictated@by the script, after all.
Komachi knew this too, of course.

group_1.textLeft: ...I guess this is it.

group_1.textRight: Right. Honestly, if at all possible...
I'd rather you didn't come to Tsukihiko's mansion@with me.

group_1.textLeft: ...Yeah.
You said you can't predict what Ruri will do if she@goes off-script.
But she WAS wearing her movie costume when@we ran into her in the club room.
Chances are good that she'll try to kill me as@scheduled.
With a...@[chara:303801:lipSynch_0][wait:1.2][chara:303801:lipSynch_1][chara:303801:effect_shake]...knife, that she got ahold of somewhere.
...No, let me do this. I've gotta save Mihono.
I'll stop Ruri, and bring her back to her senses.
Yeah.

group_1.textRight: So you're going to use yourself as a distraction?
We should at least call for backup from other@Magical Girls first...

group_1.textLeft: No.
I want to avoid putting any of the other girls in@danger.
Don't worry, okay? I'm a Magical Girl too, when all's@said and done!

group_1.textRight: And she might be wielding a knife.@...Will you still be able to move?

group_1.textLeft: ...Yeah, I'll be fine. Trust me.
Remember what you said to me before?
"No soul on Earth can turn down the leading role@in the tale that is their life."
So let me play the leading role, just this once.

group_1.textRight: I should never have said that. I didn't mean to put@pressure on you, I swear...

group_1.textLeft: ...Kira.
You sure?

group_1.textRight: You've never been the sort of person to hear@otherwise once you get an idea in your head.
If things look like they're getting too dangerous,@I'll run in to stop you.

group_1.textLeft: ...Yeah. Thank you, Kira.
Okay, let's go!

group_1.textRight: (...all I have to do to end everything is tear up@the script.)
